name: DeleteCustomerProfile
description:
Deletes a customer profile from a business.

Use this tool to delete a customer profile, especially if created by merging existing profiles. The unique customer ID is required for deletion.

parameters.name: customer_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the customer to be deleted.

value_schema.description: The ID of the customer to delete.

parameters.name: customer_profile_version
parameters.description: The current version of the customer profile. Used for optimistic concurrency control.

value_schema.description:
The current version of the customer profile.

As a best practice, you should include this parameter to enable [optimistic concurrency](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/optimistic-concurrency) control.  For more information, see [Delete a customer profile](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/customers-api/use-the-api/keep-records#delete-customer-profile).

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The ID of the customer to delete.

value_schema.description: The ID of the customer to delete.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
